sections.heading: Contempt power; justice of the peace courtsA justice of the peace may punish a direct contempt of court, as defined in Article 222, by a fine of not more than fifty dollars, or imprisonment in the parish jail for not more than twenty-four hours, or both
sections.text: Acts 1986, No. 156, ยง1; Acts 1991, No. 508, ยง3
